com.communote.server.core.property

Class UserNotePropertyAccessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.core.property.PropertyAccessor<O,P,String>
      • com.communote.server.core.property.StringPropertyAccessor<Note,UserNoteProperty>
        • com.communote.server.core.property.UserNotePropertyAccessor

  • public class UserNotePropertyAccessor
extends StringPropertyAccessor<Note,UserNoteProperty>
    Property accessor for users, don't construct it, use it from the PropertyManagement
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

    • Method Detail

      • assertReadAccess

        protected void assertReadAccess(Note note)
                         throws AuthorizationException
        Checks, that the current user is allowed to read the topic the note is in. Asserts valid read access for the given object.
        Specified by:
        assertReadAccess in class PropertyAccessor<Note,UserNoteProperty,String>
        Parameters:
        note - The object.
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException - Thrown, when the read access to the object was denied.

      • assertWriteAccess

        protected void assertWriteAccess(Note note)
                          throws AuthorizationException
        Method to assert, that the current user has write access to the given object.

        Does it by calling assertReadAccess(Note).

        Specified by:
        assertWriteAccess in class PropertyAccessor<Note,UserNoteProperty,String>
        Parameters:
        note - The object to assert write access for.
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException - Thrown, when the current user is not allowed to write to the given object.

      • getUsersOfProperty

        public <T> Collection<T> getUsersOfProperty(Long noteId,
                                            String keyGroup,
                                            String key,
                                            String value,
                                            Converter<User,T> converter)
                                     throws NotFoundException,
                                            AuthorizationException
        Return the users that a given property for a note. The found users are converted into the target type of the provided converter. Deleted users won't be included.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the target type of the conversion
        Parameters:
        noteId - the ID of the note for which the users that have the property should be returned
        keyGroup - the group key of the searched property
        key - the group of the searched property
        value - the value of the searched property
        converter - the converter to convert the found users
        Returns:
        the found users or an empty list
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - in case the note does not exist
        AuthorizationException - in case the current user is not allowed to read the property

      • handleCreateNewProperty

        protected UserNoteProperty handleCreateNewProperty(Note note)
        Create a new property and associate it with the object
        Specified by:
        handleCreateNewProperty in class PropertyAccessor<Note,UserNoteProperty,String>
        Parameters:
        note - the object to add a new property to
        Returns:
        the property created

      • handleGetAllObjectProperties

        protected Set<StringPropertyTO> handleGetAllObjectProperties(Note note)
                                                      throws AuthorizationException
        Description copied from class: StringPropertyAccessor
        Get all properties of the object. The result set will be filtered by the filter definition of the accessor
        Overrides:
        handleGetAllObjectProperties in class StringPropertyAccessor<Note,UserNoteProperty>
        Parameters:
        note - the object
        Returns:
        the properties
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException - in case the user is not allowed to access the properties of the object

                                                             String keyGroup,
                                                             String propertyKey)
                                                      throws AuthorizationException
        Description copied from class: PropertyAccessor
        Get an object property for the given group and key
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        note - the object to get the property of
        keyGroup - the key group of the property to get
        propertyKey - the key of the propert no such property exists
        Returns:

        Throws:

      • hasProperty

        public boolean hasProperty(Long noteId,
                           String keyGroup,
                           String key,
                           String value)
                    throws NotFoundException,
                           AuthorizationException
        Test whether the current user has a given property for a note
        Parameters:
        noteId - the ID of the note for which the existence of the property should be checked
        keyGroup - the group key of the searched property
        key - the group of the searched property
        value - the value of the searched property
        Returns:
        true if the user has the property otherwise false
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException - in case the current user is not allowed to read the property
        NotFoundException - in case the note does not exist
